name: Incan Culture and Civilization Online Trivia | World | 10 Questions

questions.text: In what geographic area were the Inca primarily located?
questions.explanation:
Modern day Peru.

	Their civilization covered modern day Peru and Ecuador and parts of Chile.

questions.text: Who was the last Incan emperor, not including Spanish-controlled monarchs?
What city became the Incan capital in the 12th century?
Which of the following were an enemy of the Inca?

questions.explanation:
counting device.

	The quipu was a counting tool using a system of knotted, colored strings. It was used to record dynastic histories.

questions.text: What was the language of the nobility in the Incan civilization?
Who was the protector and creator god of the Inca?
questions.explanation:
Viracocha.

	He was also known as a destroyer and transmogrifier of human beings. He created people from stone or clay.

questions.text: Who was the sun god of the Inca?
Who was the first Incan ruler to conquer land outside the Cuzco valley?
questions.explanation:
Capac Yupanqui.

	The Incan empire began to expand in the 14th century, led by the emperor Capac Yupanqui.
